name: Minocqua Winter Park
description: Covering 6,500 acres of beautiful Northwoods forest, Minocqua Winter Park has been a destination for winter enthusiasts since 1979. With 86km of expertly groomed cross-country ski trails for all ability levels, 17km of snowshoe trails, a sledding hill, a skijor loop, lessons and equipment rentals and a skating pond, theres something here for the whole family!
